Class Population

  • java.lang.Object
    • Population

  • public class Population
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for creating a Population. Shortly, its an array of Individu.
    Author:
    Jerome PIVERT, Raphael CHARLES

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

        public void initPop(int indSize)
        Cree une Population initiale de n Individus viable (n : taille population) On autorise qu'un seul Phenotype pour la population initiale
        Parameters:

      • reproduction

        public static Individu reproduction(Population p)
        Create a new Individu from two others. We randomly choose each element in the parents for creating the child.
        Parameters:
        p - population for picking parents
        Returns:
        the new viable child (possibly altered by mutations)

      • mutation

        public static Individu mutation(Individu indiv,
                double tauxMutation)
        Force mutation in one Individu with a given rate
        Parameters:
        indiv - Individu
        tauxMutation - mutation rate
        Returns:
        altered Individu

      • nextGen

        public static Population nextGen(Population p)
        Use a Population for generating the next. This is the default function, it uses the default number of allowed Phenotype (4)
        Parameters:
        p - population parent
        Returns:
        new population

      • nextGen

        public static Population nextGen(Population p,
                 int nbPhens)
        Use a Population for generating the next. You can specify how many Phenotype will be allowed in the next population
        Parameters:
        p - population parent
        nbPhens - how many Phenotype allowed
        Returns:
        new population

      • nextGenLimited

        public static Population nextGenLimited(Population p,
                        double percentMaxReprod,
                        int maxPopSize)
        Use a Population for generating the next. This function will limit the number of reproductions. It will return a new population with a different size.
        Parameters:
        p - population parent
        percentMaxReprod - percent of Individu who can reproduce
        maxPopSize - size max of the population
        Returns:
        new population size may be different from the previous

      • nextGenLimited

        public static Population nextGenLimited(Population p,
                        double percentMaxReprod,
                        int maxPopSize,
                        int nbPhens)
        Use a Population for generating the next. Limit the number of reproduction and specifiy how many Phenotype are allowed in the next population
        Parameters:
        p - population parent
        percentMaxReprod - the percent of allowed reprod
        maxPopSize -
        nbPhens - how many Phenotype allowed
        Returns:
        new population, size may differ from previous

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return a multi-line string for representing a generation. Will also call toString() from Individu

        toString in class java.lang.Object
